== Version 2.x (to be released as version 2.0) ==

 * MCI: Add custom configuration parser and drop dependency on Boost. (issue 31)
 * MCI: Make MCS use the logging infrastructure and use syslog when daemonizing (issue 22)

== Version 1.x (to be released as version 1.1) ==

 * MCI: Add man-pages for mote host and mote server as well as UDEV scripts.
 * MCI: Fix the mote control server's service loop introduced in code for issue 18.
 * MCI: Fix --enable-mch handling in the configure script.
 * MCI: Fix dig528-2 platform typo.

== Version 1.0 ==

 * Create contrib areas that provide examples and other utilities.
 * DB, GUI, WS: Add small build systems.
 * MCI: Use Autoconf/Automake based buildsystem to ease building for small environments.
 * MCI: Switch the mote control host to use UDEV instead of hotplug.

== Version 0.9 ==

The basic infrastructure with DIKU specific mote control host and server. This version was developed on [http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/re-mote sourceforge].
